title: Wifi authentication. Using PEAP the option "None" under phase 2 authentication has disappeared
content: To connect to one of our corporate wifi internets that provides pass through to the internet, I need to select PEAP authentication with Phase 2 authentication "none". This used to work, but now the option "none" has disappeared and I can't connect anymore.
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3 XL
